sub_topic: Predicting the molecular geometry of a molecule
message_1: What is the predicted molecular geometry of a molecule of XeF4, and what is the hybridization of the central atom?
message_2: The predicted molecular geometry of a molecule of XeF4 (Xenon hexafluoride) is square planar. The hybridization of the central Xenon (Xe) atom is sp3d2.
